posts.post_content:
Hi,
If you've thought of picking up a T3 or two, or even beginning a set, here is your chance.  These are nice cards, top to bottom, priced well (in my opinion) and include some of the tougher cards in the set.  There's nothing wrong with a nice PSA-3 T3 and when compared to the price of a PSA-5, a relative bargain.  The majority of the have NO creases.  Please let me know if you want any further detail on these.  Front and back scans are available.  Thanks in advance.

3. Leach PSA-3 - beautiful with a clean "NO AD" back - $400
4. Chase PSA-4 - extra clean and nice - $750
7. Camnitz PSA-3 -bright and clean "NO AD" back - $375
12. Donovan PSA-3 -beautiful front and back - SOLD
18. Jennings PSA-1 - no pinhole, nicest 1 you'll ever see - SOLD
19. Joss PSA-A - beautiful front n back, tiny corner clip - SOLD
21. Kleinow PSA-4 - very strong 4 - $450
28. McIntyre (B&C) PSA-5MK - wow, so nice, MK? - $400
29. McConnell PSA-3MK - so nice, clean "NO AD" back, MK? - $250
30. Mullin - raw - 2 pinhole o/w EX+  SOLD
30. Mullin - raw - 1 pinhole o/w VG, clean "NO AD" back $200
30. Mullin  PSA-4 - a great 4 $425
32. Overall PSA-4MK - so nice, clean "NO AD" back $300
33. Pfeister PSA-4 - beautiful colors, super clean 4 - $425
49. A Close Play at Second  PSA-4 - great, difficult card $625

86. Carrigan PSA-4 - great card SOLD
89. Criger PSA-3 - Not sure why this card isn't a 5, ad-back $325
91. Downey PSA-3 - amazing colors, great card $300
94. Gibson PSA-4MK - beautiful n clean, w/ad-back, MK? SOLD
98. Hofman PSA-3 - clean n bright $300
100. Jones PSA-3.5 - very hard card, great colors n focus $425 - SOLD
102. Kling PSA-4 - such a nice 4 $525

112. Paskert (C) PSA-3.5 - beautiful, extra nice 3.5  $425 - SOLD

Enjoy,  Craig
Email sent regarding Leach, McConnell and Jones.
Bump for a few updates on  Sunday night.  Thanks for indulging me.
